title: Homes evacuated as wildfire breaks out in east London
description: Eight hectares were destroyed in Dagenham on Monday during dry conditions, while another two grass fires also struck in Hornchurch and Walthamstow Marshes.
content:
Several homes had to be evacuated in east London after a wildfire broke out on Monday.
London Fire Brigade (LFB) confirmed that 20 fire engines and around 125 firefighters were called to the scene behind Clemence Road in Dagenham at 6.30pm.

title: Fauja Singh: British runner - believed to be world's oldest to complete a marathon - killed in road accident
description: Fauja Singh was hit by a car and suffered fatal injuries while trying to cross a road in his birth village of Beas Pind in India - and first ran the London Marathon at the age of 89.
content:
A British runner, believed to be the oldest in the world to complete a marathon, has died in a road accident aged 114.
Fauja Singh was hit by a car and suffered fatal injuries while trying to cross a road in his birth village of Beas Pind in India.

title: China GDP: Economic growth beats expectations as Trump tariffs loom
description: Beijing says the economy grew by 5.2% in the three months to the end of June, official figures show.
content:
Officials said economic growth was helped by a 6.4% expansion in manufacturing, with higher demand for 3D printing devices, electric vehicles and industrial robots.

title: Full-body scans of 100,000 people could change way diseases are detected and treated
description: UK Biobank project to share 1bn images of organs, blood vessels and bones to help study ageing and ill health
content:
Scientists expect to gain unprecedented insights into human ageing and the earliest signs of disease after scanning 100,000 people from head to toe in the world’s largest whole body imaging project.
